REFUND POLICY

Tria Packaging Solutions - Customer Refund Policy

Effective Date: October 1, 2025

1. GENERAL REFUND POLICY
We stand behind the quality of our products. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you may be eligible for a refund under the following conditions:

2. ELIGIBILITY CRITERIA
- Products must be unused and in original packaging
- Refund requests must be submitted within 30 days of delivery
- Products must not be custom-ordered or specially manufactured items
- Proof of purchase (invoice or order confirmation) is required

3. REFUND PROCESS
To request a refund:
a) Contact our customer service team at support@triapackaging.com
b) Provide your order number and reason for refund
c) Our team will review your request within 2 business days
d) If approved, return shipping instructions will be provided
e) Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days after receiving returned items

4. REFUND AMOUNT
- Full refund: If products are defective or damaged upon delivery
- Partial refund: If only some items in an order are eligible
- No refund: For custom orders or items used/opened

5. SHIPPING COSTS
- We cover return shipping for defective or incorrect items
- Customer is responsible for return shipping on buyer's remorse cases

6. EXCEPTIONS
The following items are not eligible for refund:
- Custom-printed boxes or packaging with company logos
- Clearance or discounted items marked "final sale"
- Products damaged due to misuse or improper storage

For questions about our refund policy, contact us at:
Email: support@triapackaging.com
Phone: +65 6234 5678
Business Hours: Monday-Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM SGT
